questions.question: What is the LCM of 12 and 18?
questions.explanation: LCM of 12 and 18. Prime factors: 12 = 2² × 3, 18 = 2 × 3². LCM = 2² × 3² = 36.

What is the sum of first 10 natural numbers?
questions.explanation: Sum of first n natural numbers = n(n+1)/2 = 10×11/2 = 55.

questions.explanation: 36 = 6², so it is a perfect square.
